testsuite.name: Scenario: Test toggling visibility of unit in content repository

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test toggling visibility of unit in content repository

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test toggling visibility of unit in content repository

testcase.name: When I choose creating new assignment in "Student Readiness" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test toggling visibility of unit in content repository

testcase.name: Then Assignment Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test toggling visibility of unit in content repository

testcase.name: When I save & close the assignment on the name page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test toggling visibility of unit in content repository

testcase.name: Then I see summary of the assignment with warning text "WARNING: No questions chosen for the assignment"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test toggling visibility of unit in content repository

testcase.name: When I save it anyway
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test toggling visibility of unit in content repository

testcase.name: Then the new assignment "New Assignment" is visible in its own expanded column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test toggling visibility of unit in content repository

testcase.name: And it is named as "New Assignment" in "Student Readiness" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test toggling visibility of unit in content repository

testcase.name: When I click the "Hide" button in the "Student Readiness" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test toggling visibility of unit in content repository

testcase.name: Then I see a "Show" button in the "Student Readiness" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test toggling visibility of unit in content repository

testcase.name: And I see that the "New Assignment" module is hidden in the "Student Readiness" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test toggling visibility of unit in content repository

testcase.name: When I click the "Show" button in the "Student Readiness" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test toggling visibility of unit in content repository

testcase.name: Then I see a "Hide" button in the "Student Readiness" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test toggling visibility of unit in content repository

testcase.name: And I see that the "New Assignment" module is visible in the "Student Readiness" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test toggling visibility of unit in content repository

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test toggling visibility of unit in content repository
